title: DNS Resolvers – Side-by-Side (Resolution Time & Packet Loss)

list.name: status
list.label: Status
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN t.is_active THEN 'active' ELSE 'inactive' END as status FROM targets t JOIN target_categories c ON t.category_id = c.id WHERE c.name = 'dns_resolvers' ORDER BY status DESC

list.name: target
list.label: Target
list.query: SELECT t.name as __text, t.name as __value FROM targets t JOIN target_categories c ON t.category_id = c.id WHERE c.name = 'dns_resolvers' AND (CASE WHEN $status = 'all' THEN true WHEN $status = 'active' THEN t.is_active = true WHEN $status = 'inactive' THEN t.is_active = false ELSE true END) ORDER BY t.name

targets.query: from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field == "median") |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> yield(name:"median")

from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field =~ /ping[0-9]+/) |> aggregateWindow(every:1m, fn:mean, createEmpty:false) |> group(columns:["target","_time"]) |> mean() |> set(key:"_field", value:"mean") |> group(columns:["target","_field"]) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> yield(name:"mean")

from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field =~ /ping[0-9]+/) |> aggregateWindow(every:1m, fn:mean, createEmpty:false) |> group(columns:["target","_time"]) |> quantile(q:0.10, method:"exact_mean") |> set(key:"_field", value:"p10") |> group(columns:["target","_field"]) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> yield(name:"p10")

from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field =~ /ping[0-9]+/) |> aggregateWindow(every:1m, fn:mean, createEmpty:false) |> group(columns:["target","_time"]) |> quantile(q:0.20, method:"exact_mean") |> set(key:"_field", value:"p20") |> group(columns:["target","_field"]) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> yield(name:"p20")

from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field =~ /ping[0-9]+/) |> aggregateWindow(every:1m, fn:mean, createEmpty:false) |> group(columns:["target","_time"]) |> quantile(q:0.80, method:"exact_mean") |> set(key:"_field", value:"p80") |> group(columns:["target","_field"]) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> yield(name:"p80")

from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field =~ /ping[0-9]+/) |> aggregateWindow(every:1m, fn:mean, createEmpty:false) |> group(columns:["target","_time"]) |> quantile(q:0.90, method:"exact_mean") |> set(key:"_field", value:"p90") |> group(columns:["target","_field"]) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> yield(name:"p90")

import "math"
from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field =~ /ping[0-9]+/ and not math.isNaN(f: r._value)) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: min, createEmpty:false) |> group(columns:["target", "_time"]) |> min() |> group(columns:["target"]) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> rename(columns:{_value: "min"}) |> keep(columns:["_time", "min"]) |> yield(name:"min")

import "math"
from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field =~ /ping[0-9]+/ and not math.isNaN(f: r._value)) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max, createEmpty:false) |> group(columns:["target", "_time"]) |> max() |> group(columns:["target"]) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 })) |> rename(columns:{_value: "max"}) |> keep(columns:["_time", "max"]) |> yield(name:"max")

from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field == "loss") |> aggregateWindow(every:15m, fn: mean, createEmpty:true) |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ r with _value: if r._value >= 1.0 then 500.0 else 0.0 })) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._value > 0) |> set(key:"_field", value:"unreachable") |> yield(name:"unreachable")
from(bucket:"latency") |> range(start:v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "latency" and r.target == "[[target]]" and r._field == "loss")
